text: Amata Kabua (November 17, 1928 â€“ 20 December 1996) was a Marshallese politician. He was the first President of the Marshall Islands from 1979 to 1996. Kabua died in office after a long illness, on December 20, 1996, in Honolulu, Hawaii, aged 68. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:1996 deaths Category:Disease-related deaths in Hawaii Category:Presidents of the Marshall Islands
title: Amata Kabua
